content.summary: $CONTENT_SUMMARY/Thank you for giving me this opportunity! I am an experienced software engineer with great passion for delivering exceptional user experiences with no compromises on performance. I am extremely quick at making myself comfortable with unfamiliar technologies and adapting them to solve complex problems efficiently.

positions.title: $POSITION_TITLE_VD/Full Stack Engineer
bullets: I am focusing on delivering the best possible user experience, while maintaining exceptional application performance.
Consolidated over 7 microservices into a single, highly efficient application, improving overall system performance by 40%.
Improved system reliability by 60% while migrating from cloud to on-premise compute.

positions.title: $POSITION_TITLE_AM/Platform Engineer
bullets: I focused on providing excellent tooling and refactoring existing legacy code bases to support AlertMedia's hypergrowth.
Led a comprehensive refactor effort, reducing CI/CD pipeline run time from over an hour to 7 minutes.
Developed CLI tools, reducing manual effort by 80% and accelerating the developer onboarding process by 3x.
Created a scalable framework based on Docker Compose, simplified the integration of new services and reduced setup time by 60%.

positions.title: $POSITION_TITLE_KT/Backend Engineer
bullets: I focused on writing high quality, maintainable code allowing our team to ship new features with a very high degree of confidence.
Refactored and maintained existing backend code, or our primary web application.
Shipped new features, worked through the backlog of feature requests and improvements.

positions.title: $POSITION_TITLE_CP/Full Stack Engineer
bullets: I focused on providing excellent internal tooling, allowing our team to quickly become an industry leader in Customer Support.
Designed and implemented an internal support portal, aggregating data from various services and tools, contributing to industry leading support resolution times.
Developed performant customer-facing tools and add-ons, reducing onboarding times by 40%.

positions.title: $POSITION_TITLE_MS/Internal Tooling Engineer
bullets: Developed custom tools and scripts, optimizing workflow organization and efficiency, leading to a 24% improvement in task completion speed.
Wrote detailed documentation for troubleshooting hardware and software issues, reducing ticket resolution time by 13%.
Managed and safeguarded highly confidential information, ensuring compliance with data security protocols.

projects.title: Listik
projects.description: A user-friendly application for collaborating on shopping lists. Listik is designed to be extremely fast and simple, while delivering an amazing experience for users to collaborate in real time.

projects.title: Feedlr
projects.description: Ad-free YouTube frontend alternative with build-in sponsor blocking and zero tracking.

projects.title: Aftermath
projects.description: Highly rated Discord Bot for in-game progress tracking with a beautiful UI and a custom rendering engine.

projects.title: Pulley
projects.description: User-friendly CLI tool for fast git repository management.
